import { useRef } from 'react' import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup' const Sidebar = (props) => { //const listEl = useRef() const handleClick = (event) => { const listEl = event.currentTarget const activeEl = document.querySelector(".list-color-modified-active") activeEl.className = "list-group-item list-group-item-action list-color-modified" listEl.className = "list-group-item list-group-item-action list-color-modified-active" props.update(event.target.textContent) } return (
